title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Enhancing Math Teachers' Capabilities for Transitioning to Online Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain how to effectively utilize LMS and various digital tools for designing online mathematics education
Learners will be able to design three or more interactive class activities that promote student engagement in remote education environments
Learners will be able to systematically organize step-by-step explanations of mathematical concepts using mobile-based microlearning materials
Learners will be able to develop online lesson designs applicable to actual classes through project-based assessments and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
